Title: Why Growing Your Business Is Simpler Than You Think
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       A seasonal business that must change its business model to keep from losing its team

•       How to set up a leadership and self-development program for your team

•       A business owner that gave away 50% of their profits

•       How franchising your company could cost you everything
